semantic_identifier: [GOLD-132]: Add compliance presets + in-app admin UI for tenant content/comms controls
title: Add compliance presets + in-app admin UI for tenant content/comms controls

sections.text: Implement a UI in Sales_Accelerator for admins to view and update the tenant-level compliance settings added in GOLD-131, including clear descriptions of what each toggle blocks. Add one-click presets for common regulated environments (e.g., “Regulated/No AI Generation”, “PII-Restricted Comms Ingestion”) with safe defaults to reduce implementation time. Ensure changes are validated client/server-side and display an explicit “why blocked” message when generation or ingestion is disabled by policy.
